fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives: EU Commission car sharing framework programme linked to the Directorate General for Mobility and Transport (MOVE).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Implementation of free floating carsharing in european metropolis. Finding solutions for cities to solve traffic, emission and noise problems caused by individual traffic as well as freeing up parking spaces used by private cars.
relevant_communication: Registration events to gain more customers in public, companies and institutions. Participating in events, congresses and forums focusing on the future of mobiliy europe and worldwide
